au.com.cybersearch2.classywidget

Class PropertiesListAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • au.com.cybersearch2.classywidget.PropertiesListAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter

    public class PropertiesListAdapter
extends android.widget.BaseAdapter
    PropertiesListAdapter Adapts a ListView to display name, value pairs in a standard Android simple list
    Author:
    Andrew Bowley 29/05/2014

        data - Value collection. The underlying properties list is populated with this data, retaining collection order.
